WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 03 SEP
   BY M/V SW DIAMOND TOWING NINE CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-14.89S 040-07.70W, 21-16.62S 040-08.54W,
   21-25.68S 039-54.44W, 21-24.17S 039-53.19W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 04 SEP 21.
